title: Lovely one bedroom unit in sought after Queen Village
description:
Lovely one bedroom unit in sought after Queen Village. This quaint, self managed and well maintained unit and building has a spacious, shared, gated courtyard space. This unit offers a nice sized living area with hardwood floors, exposed brick, recessed lighting and a ceiling fan, a fully-equipped updated kitchen with tile backsplash, granite countertops, and breakfast bar, a full updated bath with built-in shelving a shower/tub combination, and a sizeable bedroom in the rear. There is central air, good closet space, an in-unit washer/dryer, newer HVAC system and trash and snow removal services. The location is awesome, close to popular Philadelphia Java Company, For Pete’s Sake Pub, Lucky’s Last Chance, Headhouse Salon, and green spaces such as Mario Lanza Park, and Shot Tower Recreation Center. Center City and 95 are both extremely accessible to this area. Don’t miss out on this opportunity!
213 Christian St #3

title: Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood
description:
Welcome to 1705 Spruce St! Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood, these new 2021 full gut-rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic district. With construction finalized in 2021, these brand-new units offer high-end appliances, plenty of closet space, and lovely views. With seven (7) available units, there are a variety of floorplans available for those seeking either a studio or 1-bedroom. You won’t have to worry about laundry, as each apartment has access to laundry on the first floor and some select floor-plans offer an in-unit washer/dryer! With so many attractions nearby, this location is the epitome of ideal: steps away from Rittenhouse Park, Starbucks, restaurants, shopping, and so much more. Transportation is a breeze, with countless bus routes around the corner and just a quick stroll to the BSL. We have three featured units at the moment, but you can find the floor-plans for all units throughout this website. For questions or to request a tour, please contact the Philly Home Advisors! Unit 1R is approximately 300 sq ft offering a kitchen with brand new stainless-steel appliances, dishwasher, and quartz countertops. With lots of cabinetry, there is plenty of storage! The bathroom includes a shower/tub combo, new vanity, and gorgeous modern tiling. The bedroom offers a comfortable space, lots of natural lighting, and a nicely sized closet. This 1-bed, 1-bath is offered at $1,395 a month, plus the cost of utilities. Located right outside the unit is the communal laundry, where two (2) sets of free washers and dryers are found for the tenant’s convenience.
1705 Spruce St #2

title: Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia
description:
Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia, and you'll be blocks from the center of nightlife in Logan Square and Rittenhouse Square. Unit features modern kitchens, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washers and dryers, breakfast bars, pendant lighting, tile backsplashes, wood plank flooring throughout, walk-in closets. It boasts Philadelphia's largest pools, an art studio, fitness center with boxing gym, yoga/spin studio, social lounge with demonstration kitchen, gourmet market and cafe, outdoor lounge with fire pit, 24-hour concierge, 24/7 package acceptance, resident shuttle service to Center City and University City and more. description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: Walking Distance to the heart of NoLibs!
description:

West Poplar offers the quiet living, but close proximity to all of the action!
